Description.Bodytext: Die Betriebsanleitung verwendet Symbole und Zeichen, die Ihnen das schnelle Auffinden von Informationen erleichtern. Lesen Sie die Erläuterungen zu den Symbolen im folgenden Abschnitt.

Description.Bodytext: Alle in dieser Betriebsanleitung genannten Höchstwerte für Leistung, Belastung, Druck etc. sind Grenzwerte.
Diese Werte sind Basis für die konstruktive Auslegung und Festigkeitsberechnung der Bauteile.

SafetyContent.Consequences: Werden zulässige Grenzwerte überschritten, können Teile der Maschine zerstört werden. In Folge davon können Personen verletzt oder getötet werden!

ActionStep.Text: Maschine immer innerhalb der zulässigen Grenzwerte betreiben!

Description.Bodytext: Die Überschreitung/Nichtbeachtung der genannten Grenzwerte beim Betrieb der Anlage/Maschine stellt einen bestimmungswidrigen Gebrauch der Anlage/Maschine dar und schließt die Haftung seitens Voith Paper für daraus entstehende Schäden aus.
Technical specifications of the system.

Bodytext.Emphasis: All entries of the following table are filled via external data stored in Excel or exported XML from SAP.
The number of possible entries is not limited.

Description.Bodytext: Die Aufgabe des Systems ist es, einzelne Holzscheite von einem Holzstapel aufzuheben und diese in einen bereitstehenden Korb zu legen.

Legend.LegendText: Carriage with Main Gear and Limit Scitch
Rail System with Guiding Chain and Position Magnets (Pos. 1 / Pos. 2)

SubChapter.Heading: Carriage with Main Gear and LimitSwitch

Description.Bodytext: The Carriage bears the components of the system. It moves forward horizontally on rails.
The Carriage brings the Gripper into optimal position to grab the at time highest wood log.
The horizontal position of the carriage is calculated by analyzing the time travelled over the entire length.
StartPosition of the carriage (Pos.1, "Garage") and EndPosition (Pos. 2, "EndPosition") are defined via two LimitSwitches.
Energy Supply LiPo 3200mAh 3S 11.1V 20C

List.ListHead: The used model is available at:

Description.Bodytext: The Microcontroller Arduino Mega2560 contains the Central Prosessing Unit, it controls all other elements which are connected to it. The program is loaded directly to the Arduino Mega2560.

LegendText.Emphasis: THESE PINS ARE ACCESSIBLE ONLY VIA THE UPMOST 10 A DC SHIELD

List.ListHead: Controlled by the Arduino Mega2560 installed on the carriage are:

ListEntry.Bodytext: 5 Volt power supply for sensors and secondary boards (excludes engines)
first Shield controls the Main Gear
second shield controls the four Winders (together with the Relay Board)
provides a stable 5.0 Volt output for needed sensor voltage
communicates with port "Direction" of the Main Gear
communicates with Limit Switch "Stop" (connection via blue cable)
communicates with Limit Switch "Start" (connection via blue cable)
communicates with Limit Switch "Top" (connection via blue cable)
communicates with port TX (connection via yellow cable)
communicates with port RX (connection via green cable)
SWITCH; TESTING provides a stable 5.0 Volt output for needed sensor voltage
LATER; SKIPPING; communicates with Inclinometer XY
LATER; SKIPPING; communicates with Inclinometer XZ
communicates with port "Direction" of the Main Gear

The second 10A DC Motor Driver Arduino Shield controls:

ListEntry.Bodytext: speed of all four LMC gear motors (each activated individually via Relay)
voltage inversion of all four LMC gear motors (activation individually)

List.ListHead: The used model [Gear] with gear ratio 810:1 is available at:

Description.Bodytext: The four winches are designed to lower the gripper vertically / to lift the grippper vertically.
Each Gear Motor is triggered individually by one of the four Channels of the Relay.
Speed and Direction of the entire group are controlled by the second Motor Shield.

Description.Bodytext: The Rail System is designed to keep the carriage on track and to move it forward (including position control).

Description.Bodytext: Damit die unvollständige Maschine ordnungsgemäß und ohne Beeinträchtigung der Sicherheit und Gesundheit von Personen mit den anderen Teilen zur vollständigen Maschine zusammengebaut werden kann, müssen alle anderen Teile (wie Antriebe, Medienversorgung...) gemäß der Maschinenrichtlinie (EG-RL 2006/42/EG) des Europäischen Parlaments und des Rates über Maschinen konstruiert, gebaut und sachgerecht installiert und gewartet werden.

NoteContent.Text: This manual serves as standard manual.

Description.Bodytext: Observe the general safety instructions and protective measures covered in chapter 2 as well as the applicable legal regulations.
The traversing carriage on rails moves forward and backwards, using distance sensor TC.
A second distance sensor HD pointing downwards measures the changes of the height differential on the ground.
The unevenness of the ground surface is – in this case – due to the different positions of wood logs, which are piled into a heap.

ListEntry.Bodytext: The software analyses the travelled distance from wall to wall (travel): x-axis
The software analyses the height differential (height): y-axis

Description.Bodytext: The distance sensor HD is pointing directly downwards.
This second sensor is – together with Distance Sensor TC @ Analog Pin_A1 – also connected to the M&suppresshy;icrocontroller Arduino Mega2560 @ Analog Pin_A3.
For testing the equipment some wood logs are placed onto a blanket.
The Laser Meter is pointing directly downwards to the wood logs on the blanket.
The visualization is done via the terminal program "gnuplot"

List.ListHead: Used version is:
The Arduino software should read/write:

Description.Bodytext: The data are stored in a text file, using CoolTerm Version 1.4.1.
This text file is the analyzed by "gnuplot".
The readings of the TC Sonar and the HD Sonar are influenced by noise or dropping voltage when the DC motor is working.
The low-pass filter does eliminate all frequencies above the cutoff frequency while passing those below remain unchanged.
In order to avoid a drop in power supply (when other electronic devices are turned on), a separate power supply of these devices will be installed.
The following documentation can be found in the supplied folders for the present Operation Manual.
